text: the prosecutors simply announced that
they wanted information about this third
bomber the escape bomber the so-called
hat man and they played a video a very
interesting video which is available on
their website retracing some of his
movements in the two and a half hours
after the bombs first went off in
Brussels Airport they've reconstructed
movements via CCTV cameras that they
clearly would have been studying for
many many days and they show snippets of
his journey by foot into the center of
town it was interesting that they say
that he took off his white jacket as he
walked into town he was seen about an
hour later by one CCTV camera he wasn't
running he was in a shirt sleeved shirt
and then the cameras lost him at 950 am
in the center of town that was about two
and a half hours after the attack
